Quote.Text: Well more far-fetched than a mobster walking into a paper company for a low-level shakedown? And that happened.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Michael. Incredible news. Grotti is clean.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No. He's not. He's just good. Nothing sticks to him. You still don't understand how this works.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No, Michael. What we're trying to say is, we made a mistake assuming he was mafia. I have a buddy who's a Fed, and we did a background check on the guy. His background is perfectly clean.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: It's true, he's clean. I have a couple of friends still on the force. Checked with them. Ran his Fed friend up the flagpole to make sure he wasn't on the take. Turns out he's a totally lovely guy. Sweetest guy on the force really.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Class act. Boy scout.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: But Grotti acts like he's mafia though.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: He's trying to intimidate you to close sales. He's just a pushy salesman.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: And he made us all look like chumps!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [grunts]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: If there is one thing I hate more than the mafia it is a liar. I wish the mafia would go out and kill all the liars. Bury them in my yard. And I wouldn't tell the cops a thing. Not that I would be lying per se. But I would just get really quiet, all of a sudden.

Quote.Speaker: Grotti
Quote.Text: This is Grotti.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: This is Scott.

Quote.Speaker: Grotti
Quote.Text: Oh! Great. Michael, I'm finishing up your paperwork right now.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh really? Is that supposed to scare me?

Quote.Speaker: Grotti
Quote.Text: I, I thought you'd be pleased.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well you thought wrong. Because I am not pleased. I'm actually kind of PO'd.

Quote.Speaker: Grotti
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I think you know exactly why, because you were trying to scare me into buying insurance.

Quote.Speaker: Grotti
Quote.Text: I don't get it. How was I scaring you?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I think you knew exactly what you were doing. And frankly I think you were being a total and utter jerk.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Whoa. Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You suck!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay that's-

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: And I'm not gonna buy your stupid insurance.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That's good, let's wrap it up.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: How about that? The only person that actually needs insurance is you, if you show your face around here again, got it?

Quote.Speaker: Grotti
Quote.Text: Look, Michael, when we all calm down here, maybe at some point in the future, you change your mind, why don't you give me a call?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Doubt it. [disconnects call]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight and Andy
Quote.Text: [relaxing] Oh man.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What a tool. [Dwight and Andy exchange looks] What?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Next time you look in the mirror, you're gonna be looking at a guy who stood down the mafia!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No. What do you mean?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: We just told you he wasn't mafia, so you wouldn't be scared.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You successfully backed down the mob!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: You made the mafia apologize to you! You made the mafia be polite!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh man. I should be mad at you guys. But I'm not.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: So I looked him in the eye and I said, "Not today Grotti, Not today. And not tomorrow, and not the next day. Or the day after that. And you can tell all your friends that if I see them, then they're already dead." I said something like that.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Very close.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Just to be clear, he backed down an insurance agent from Mutual of Harrisburg.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Erin?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Yes?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Coffee?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Not from the kitchen. Stop and Shop. If it's not Stop and Shop, I send it back.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Large. If it's a medium I send it back. If it's an extra large I send it back.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: How do you return coffee?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Go. Any questions?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [on phone] Are you kidding me?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Hi Pam, is Jim there?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Listen our credit card has been cancelled and we have to deal with that, and I really can't handle the fact that you're calling us here!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Okay, that sounds good. Um, I'll let you go, just -tell Jim, that I said hi.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh I will. I will Kevin. I will make that my top priority.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Cool. Okay. [Pam hangs up] Bye.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: They have no idea what happened.
